overview.en: Encrypted calabash baby is a digital collection with collectible value and interesting gameplay based on the intelligent contract of ethereum.Players can buy and sell calabash dolls with ether currency. Each calabash dolls has its own characteristics, and the appearance is either lovely or cool. Each calabash dolls have a strong collection value.The production mechanism of calabash dolls can be divided into two types, one is official output and the other is planting output.The official production of calabash dolls is set as limited acquisition, and will gradually slow down the release rate, certain small probability, there will be some special calabash dolls to surprise players.Gourd Eva can be hung on market sale, gourd Eva can grow to breed grow new gourd Eva varieties, each bottle gourd dolls are features, the characteristics of offspring is based on genetic algorithm is written in the contract, intelligences characteristic determinant is the dominant and recessive gene gourd doll, so the algorithm for breeding mechanism gives certain randomness.These calabash dolls have different levels of characteristics, and good calabash dolls are of great collection value for many players.This kind of descendants with a certain randomness will bring great fun to the players.With the continuous improvement of ethereum's underlying performance, our existing architecture can be extended to many other gameplay methods with imaginary space, thus ensuring the continued value of digital collectibles and game expansibility.
overview.zh: 加密葫芦娃是一款基于以太坊智能合约开发的有收藏价值，以及趣味游戏性的数字收藏品。玩家可以用以太币买卖交易葫芦娃，每个葫芦娃都有自己的特性，且外观或呆萌可爱或酷炫拉风，每只葫芦娃都有着极强的收集价值。葫芦娃的产生机制分为两种，一种是官方产出，一种是种植产出。官方产出的葫芦娃被设定为限量获取，并且会逐渐放缓发放速度，一定小概率下，会出现一些特殊葫芦娃，给玩家惊喜。葫芦娃可以被挂在交易市场上买卖，葫芦娃可以种植繁殖长出新的葫芦娃品种，每只葫芦娃都是有特性的，后代的特性都是根据遗传算法写到智能合约上，特性的决定因素是葫芦娃的显性和隐性基因，因此算法给繁衍机制赋予了一定的随机性。这些葫芦娃的特性有等级区别，优质的葫芦娃对于很多玩家来说有极强的收藏价值。这种具备一定的随机性的后代龙会给玩家带来无穷的乐趣。随着以太坊底层性能的不断提升，我们现有的架构可以扩展出非常多具有想象空间的其他玩法，从而保证数字收藏品的持续价值和游戏扩展性。
